title: GAMEPLAY- Ori winter skin
body: Orianna with the winter wonder skin. i was in a poro game playing as winter wonder ori, and on the other team also have an orianna. at the beginning i could see where my ball was but soon after a few deaths i couldnt see the ball when i place it on myself, nor did my team and the other team. but i was able to see it when i move it around. the other ori was fine. it could be something wrong with the skin maybe?

replies.body:
Hey Bromancerect,

Thanks for the report! Would you happen to have a video to accompany this? I'm not able to get a solid repro for this, so any additional information you have would be helpful!
